snippet.title: Tactical Realism | SCP: PANDEMIC | Content Focus Part 2
snippet.description:
Our deep dive into our development process underway to make SCP: Pandemic an immersive tactical experience, hosted by Anders, the founder of the ISMC mod — along with Affray's Technical Director, Albarnie.

PART 1: https://youtu.be/NuaxjGYmd8A

Insurgency: Sandstorm, Ready Or Not, and Escape From Tarkov are properties of their respective owners. Affray is not associated with, affiliated with, or endorsed by them.

0:00 - Introduction (Anders)
0:58 - ISMC Mod efforts to working on SCP: Pandemic
2:03 - AffrayCore FPSController design breakdown (Albarnie)
4:30 - New weight system for weapon control
5:29 - How our design philosophies apply to ongoing development
5:49 - Optics and reticles
6:16 - Ballistics overhaul + armor system plans
7:06 - Weapon customization
7:34 - SCP: Pandemic Modding + AffrayCore licensing
8:00 - An SCP tactical shooter
8:47 - Outroduction

#SCPPandemic #SCP #SCPFoundation
